description.value: Codes used to identify medical devices. Include codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 49062001 (Device) and is provided as a suggestive example.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organization (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
